trans-unit.target: Elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione di valori che specifica il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è il valore <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Hides all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Consente di nascondere tutti gli elementi che si trovano in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>.
